content:

293 subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['apt-get', '-y', '--with-new-pkgs', 'upgrade']' returned non-zero exit status 100.
I'm not familiar with details of the upgrade process, but it looks like you didn't have a good network connection to access the required packages on internet servers.
That looks like DNS is not configured correctly on the server.
Thank Neil and Alex,There is indeed a problem with my DNS server. After making the modifications, it can be upgraded normally
TwoDogs2 has marked this topic as resolved.
